com.jefflunt.movers
Class Mover

java.lang.Object
  com.jefflunt.movers.Mover
All Implemented Interfaces:
Actor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Accelerator, Pedestrian
public class Mover
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor

This class extends the com.jefflunt.actors.Actor class, and provides extra functionality for movement and collision detection.

Constructor Summary
Mover(double x, double y)
          Creates a new Mover at the specified (x, y) coordinate.
 
Method Summary
 void act()
          Based on the time slice from Clock.getMasterClock(), this method causes the Mover change its speed and move an appropriate amount of space.

Constructor Detail

Mover

public Mover(double x,
             double y)
Creates a new Mover at the specified (x, y) coordinate. By default, collision detection is turned on, the boundary box has a width and height of 1, and the Mover starts its life not moving at all.

Parameters:
x - the x-coordinate of the new Mover
y - the y-coordinate of the new Mover
Method Detail

think

public void think()
Description copied from interface: Actor
Causes the actor to think about what they need to do next. Generally you should think before you act.

Specified by:
think in interface Actor

act

public void act()
Based on the time slice from Clock.getMasterClock(), this method causes the Mover change its speed and move an appropriate amount of space.

Specified by:
act in interface Actor

Gets the direction of movement in radians.

setTargetLocation

public void setTargetLocation(int x,
                              int y)
Sets the target location of this mover. The direction of travel is adjusted automatically.

Parameters:
x - the x-coordinate of the target location
y - the y-coordinate of the target location

getTargetX

public double getTargetX()
Gets the x-coordinate of the location to which the Pedestrian is trying to get.

Returns:
the x-coordinate of the location to which the Pedestrian is traveling.

Returns:
the y-coordinate of the location to which the Pedestrian is traveling.

teleportTo

public void teleportTo(double x,
                       double y)
Instantly teleports the Mover to the specified (x, y) coordinate.

Parameters:
x - The new x-coordinate
y - The new y-coordinate

moveBy

public void moveBy(double deltaX,
                   double deltaY)
Instantly shifts the Mover along the x and y axis by the specified amounts.

Parameters:
deltaX - The amount to shift the Mover along the x-axis.
deltaY - The amount to shift the Mover along the y-axis.

getCurrSpeed

public double getCurrSpeed()
Gets the current speed at which the Mover is traveling.

Returns:
The speed, along the Mover's direction in units/second, that the Mover is traveling at this time.

setCurrSpeed

public void setCurrSpeed(double speed)
Instantly changes the current speed at which the Mover is traveling.

Parameters:
speed - The speed at which the Mover will be moving.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if speed is < 0.0.
